member.name: FSBANK_FORMAT.FSBANK_FORMAT_PCM_BIGENDIAN
member.summary: PCM Big Endian (1:1) Xbox360 and PS3 only.

member.name: FSBANK_FORMAT.FSBANK_FORMAT_XMA
member.summary: XMA (VBR) Xbox360 / XboxOne only (hardware). Depends on xmaencoder.

member.name: FSBANK_FORMAT.FSBANK_FORMAT_AT9_PSVITA
member.summary: ATRAC9 (CBR) PSVita only (hardware). Depends on libatrac9.

member.name: FSBANK_FORMAT.FSBANK_FORMAT_AT9_PS4
member.summary: ATRAC9 (CBR) PS4 only (hardware). Depends on libatrac9.

member.name: FSBANK_FORMAT.FSBANK_FORMAT_VORBIS
member.summary: Vorbis (VBR) All platforms. Depends on libvorbis.

member.name: FSBANK_FORMAT.FSBANK_FORMAT_MAX
member.summary: Upper bound for this enumeration, for use with validation.
